NAME().details: get a human-readable name for the distributor that describes basic functionality On-chain consumers should rely on registered ERC165 interface IDs or similar for more specificity

VERSION().details: get a human-readable version for the distributor that describes basic functionality The version should update whenever functionality significantly changes On-chain consumers should rely on registered ERC165 interface IDs or similar for more specificity

getFractionDenominator().details: get the denominator for vesting fractions represented as integers
